experience: You and Steve both know Max Hansen, Ketan Patel, and 18 others

We are revolutionizing the mortgage process for loan originators, looking to utilize technology to support top producers in being able to grow their production exponentially. If you know of anyone in the mortgage industry, VIP Mortgage will be a great home for them to achieve their personal dreams.My Team is still Originating Mortgages and we would love to help any clients that are looking for a more streamlined and efficient way to get their mortgage done. - Specializing in AZ, CA, CO, & IL Markets- Certified Mortgage Planning Specialist- Mortgage Originator for 10+ years- Have had record growth in our portfolio in one of the worst Real Estate Markets in History- Experts in Working with Investors, Self-Employed Borrowers, and Clients with Multiple Properties as well as first time Homebuyers- Top 1% of Mortgage Originators in the Country in 2012- President's Club Member, 2012 & 2013- $50M Producer in 2012- Goal is to Effectively Manage $1B in Mortgages- Graduated in Finance & MIS from the University of Illinois@Urbana-ChampaignSpecialties: Mortgage Purchasing, Refinancing, and Planning. Assisting homeowners and investors in obtaining the mortgage that best suits their financial needs.V.I.P. Mortgage, Inc. NMLS #: 145502Individual NMLS # 235760

We are revolutionizing the mortgage process by providing top of the line education and service to allow our clients to actively engage in and understand mortgage planning. With their help, we will effectively manage all mortgage debt for our clients in AZ, CA, CO, and IL and in teaming with our partners we will continue educating our clients to ultimately lead to greater educational and financial awareness for our clients, partners, & country; leading to a greater peace of mind, less stress, and a greater financial future.

Operated as a mortgage broker in coordinating and planning mortgages for my clientele. Ran a fully staffed office and produced $5-15M annually in mortgage loans. Developed a strong business plan to grow and continue capturing market share, despite the difficult environment of the lending industry.

On Feb. 9th 2007 on my birthday, Steve and my real estate agent Frank helped me purchase my home. I did not understand the language of mortgage companies. Steve was there every step of the way with me. He would re-word the language in so many ways until I understood it. We would laugh but he was there making sure that I understood everything. For this reason when I hear a friend or co-worker needing help, Steve is the one I recommend always. Thanks Steve for all you do because if you cared about me I know you care for everyone else you help. May the good Lord keep blessing you.          Linda Howell

March 4, 2011, Edward (Eddie) was a client of Steve’s

We worked with Steve about a year ago and if I had to use one word to describe his service... it would be exceptional.  Steve's follow through and attention to detail, both during the loan process and after, were wonderful.  We were working on a very tight schedule and had "out of the norm" circumstances with relocating and owning other property out of state, but Steve was able to deliver as promised and surpassed our expectations in every way.  I would definitely recommend him to friends, family and colleagues and we plan to utilize his services for any future loan needs that may come up.  Steve is resourceful, friendly, honest and reliable.  I don't think you could find a better person to handle your mortgage needs.  Steve had a scheduled trip that required him to leave the country just before our loan was funded, which might make some clients uneasy  Due to his thoroughness, he was able to hand off the funding of our loan to his very capable colleagues for a seamless transition and closing.  Phenomenal service by Steve and everyone on his team!

I first worked with Steve and his able staff when my wife and I decided to refinance our primary home mortgage in 2010.  After interviewing several individuals and firms, I selected Steve at Guaranteed Rate because of his clear knowledge of the subject and his responsiveness to my various inquiries. I was extremely pleased with Steve's efforts on my behalf and the end result was better than expected. I found Steve to be honest, knowledgeable and responsive. Several months later, when my wife and I decided to purchase a second home, we did not hesitate to once again turn to Steve and his team for assistance. Over the months of working with Steve, I found him to be highly professional, as well as a fine young man. It is my pleasure to recommend Steve for both his professional skills and his personal attributes.   fpc/2011

I have worked with Jon since 2010. Jon has helped me both personally and professionally. While working with him, he has developed me as a leader and allowed me to clarify my business objectives and where I wanted to take my business. With his help, our team increased our volume from $12.5M in 2009 to over $52M in 2012. Now continuing to work with Jon, I have shifted my focus to assisting VIP Mortgage Inc. in building a revolutionary mortgage platform that will impact many originators for years to come. Jon is amazing at what he does and is now impacting more and more originators every day by helping them build a similar plan to expand their business, improve their life, or whatever it is they are looking to do. I would highly recommend Jon and his talents and hope to continue working with him for many years to come.

summary: With a background in MIS and 10 years of Mortgage Originator Experience, my new position is allowing me to build the mortgage industry's first ever organization-wide CRM platform. We are building a revolutionary Sales & Operations Experience for Loan Originators, Processors, and an entire company to transform the way that clients will obtain a mortgage in the future.Originally from the Chicagoland area, I chose to move out west in 2004 after receiving a degree in Management Information Systems/Finance. I fell into the mortgage industry in 2004 in Arizona, when the market was red hot. Over the next couple years, the market began to slow and I began to manage the relationships that I had with clients and partners much more closely. Starting in 2008 I began to develop a platform to help me better manage these relationships in addition to streamlining and automating the complicated mortgage process. From 2009 to 2012, my team's production grew from $12.5M to over $50M in mortgage originations. In 2013 I was introduced to VIP Mortgage with a new job - implement this platform throughout an entire organization. VIP is poised to triple production from 2013 to 2016 and we are looking to reinvent the mortgage industry with Professional Loan Originators who want to do large production while providing the best possible service to their clients. We are focused on building relationships for life and helping those with HEART accomplish more together than they ever could alone.
name: Steve Miksta
title: Sr. VP of Sales Development at VIP Mortgage Inc.
